snippet: Ms. Deavere’s talk, titled “On the Road: A Search for American Character,” will include reflections on and excerpts from the documentary theater projects she began developing in the early 1980s.
abstract: Ms. Deavere’s talk, titled “On the Road: A Search for American Character,” will include reflections on and excerpts from the documentary theater projects she began developing in the early 1980s.

headline.main: Anna Deavere Smith to Deliver Jefferson Lecture
headline.print_headline: Anna Deavere Smith To Give Jefferson Lecture
